Total Size...........: 71.5 MB


---------------------------------------------------------------------

Debut album of Canadian rock band 'The Folk'

The Folk are: Sara BV on lead and group vocals, electric guitar, piano and synthesizer; Emma BV on electric and acoustic guitar, piano, synthesizer, group vocals and whispers; Mark Ferrari on lead and group vocals, acoustic and electric guitar, piano, synthesizer and conversation collage; Liam Magahay on group vocals and bass; Patrick Rody on drums, tambourine and shaker. 

In Silence, Subtle Play and Deep Space written by Sara Bortolon-Vettor. So They Say, Staying Up All Night and We All Say/Basement Feeling written by Sara Bortolon-Vettor and Mark Ferrari. Soft Dispute written by Emma Bortolon-Vettor and Sara Bortolon-Vettor. I'll See You Again and I Care (If You Care) written by Mark Ferrari. Physical Sound written by Liam Magahay. 

Produced by The Folk and Nick Biffis. Engineered and Mixed by Nick Biffis. Mastered by JoÃƒÂ£o Carvalho.
